TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlInputImage extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler, class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler
Public Class HtmlInputImage Inherits HtmlInputControl Implements IPostBackDataHandler, IPostBackEventHandler
public ref class HtmlInputImage : System::Web::UI::HtmlControls::HtmlInputControl, System::Web::UI::IPostBackDataHandler, System::Web::UI::IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 允許以程式設計方式存取伺服器上的 HTML 項目。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用控制項來建立顯示影像的按鈕。Use the control to create a button that displays an image. 您可以透過程式設計方式控制與相關聯的動作控制項所提供的事件處理常式事件。You can programmatically control the action associated with the control by providing an event handler for the event. 使用者按一下處的座標控制項可以透過使用和屬性做為參數傳遞至使用者定義事件處理常式的物件。The coordinates where the user clicks an control can be determined by using the and properties of the object that is passed as a parameter to the user-defined event handler. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制項來建立顯示影像的按鈕。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to create a button that displays an image. > [!NOTE] > 您必須提供您自己的映像檔案，此範例正常運作。You must provide your own image files for this example to work correctly. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體控制項。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the control. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"Image"常值字串。The "image" literal string.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的新執行個體控制，並將它放在網頁上。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the control and place it on the Web page. summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項相對於 Web 網頁上其他項目的對齊方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page.

value.span: 和 Web 網頁上其他項目相關的 控制項之對齊方式。

span.span: The alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的對齊方式相對於其他項目在網頁上的控制項。Use the property to specify the alignment of the control in relation to the other elements on the Web page. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的對齊方式相對於其他項目在網頁上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page. summary.span: 取得或設定在沒有影像或尚未下載完成時，瀏覽器將顯示的替代文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternative text that the browser displays if the image is unavailable or has not been downloaded.
The alternative text for the specified image.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要顯示時指定的映像無法使用或尚未下載的文字。Use the property to specify the text to display when the specified image is not available or has not been downloaded. 您也可以使用這個屬性，以程式設計方式判斷指定的替代文字。You can also use this property to programmatically determine the specified alternative text. 在瀏覽器支援工具提示的功能，此文字也會顯示為工具提示控制項。In browsers that support the ToolTip feature, this text also appears as a ToolTip for the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要顯示的映像無法使用時的替代文字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alternate text to display when the image is not available. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項的框線寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets the border width for the control.

value.span: 控制項的框線寬度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The border width, in pixels, for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的框線寬度控制項。Use the property to specify the border width for the control. > [!NOTE] > 在所有瀏覽器不支援這個屬性。This property is not supported in all browsers. 請檢查您的瀏覽器，以判斷相容性。Check your browser to determine compatibility. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的框線寬度控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the border width for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputImage.Align Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Align Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputImage.Align Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Align Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool CausesValidation { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property CausesValidation As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CausesValidation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出按一下 控制項時，是否執行驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果按一下 控制項時會執行驗證，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the control is clicked; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，會執行頁面驗證時按一下控制項時。By default, page validation is performed when an control is clicked. 頁面驗證會判斷是否與驗證頁面上的控制項通過所有驗證控制項所指定的驗證規則相關聯輸入的控制項。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 您可以指定，或決定是否要在用戶端和伺服器上執行驗證時藉由按下控制項屬性。You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an control is clicked by using the property. 若要避免執行驗證，將屬性`false`。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to `false`. 這個屬性通常用於事件處理常式以防止頁面驗證時按一下 [取消] 或重設按鈕時所發生的事件。This property is commonly used in the event handler for the event to prevent page validation from occurring when a Cancel or Reset button is clicked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用以防止發生頁面驗證的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent page validation from occurring. 請注意如何方法獨立啟動每個驗證控制項。Notice how the method activates each validation control independently. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputImageCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageCausesValidation/CS/htmlinputimagecausesvalidationcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputImageCausesValidation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageCausesValidation/VB/htmlinputimagecausesvalidationvb.aspx#1)]

param.span: 控制項的索引鍵識別項。

span.span: The key identifier for the control.

param.span: 所有內送名稱值的集合。

span.span: The collection of all incoming name values.

summary.span: 處理 控制項的回傳資料。

span.span: Processes the postback data for the control.

returns.span: 如果回傳的結果改變了 控制項的狀態，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the control's state has changed as a result of the postback; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會檢查一部分的回傳資料是否代表已由使用者所按下映像的位置座標控制項。The method checks to see whether coordinates that represent the location where the image was clicked by the user are part of the postback data for the control. 如果座標的回傳資料中，一部分則方法暫存器網頁做為需要時處理引發事件的控制項的控制項。If coordinates are part of the postback data, then the method registers the control with the Web page as a control that requires an event to be raised when it is processed. > [!NOTE] > 原點座標 (0，0) 位於影像的左上角。The origin coordinates (0,0) are located in the upper-left corner of the image. 主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void OnPreRender (EventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void OnPreRender(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub OnPreRender (e As EventArgs)
protected public: override void OnPreRender(EventArgs ^ e);

span.span: An that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫之前轉譯控制項。The method is called just prior to rendering the control. 主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，使它永遠都會顯示自訂無框線使用的伺服器控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it always displays a custom server control with no border. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputimage_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputimage_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputimage_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputimage_onprerender.vb#2)]

para.span: 在覆寫方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnServerClick(class System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnServerClick (e As ImageClickEventArgs)

span.span: An that contains event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件，當使用者按一下控制項。The event is raised when the user clicks an control. 使用者按一下處的座標控制項可以透過使用和屬性物件。The coordinates where the user clicks an control can be determined by using the and properties of the object. 物件當做參數傳遞至使用者定義的事件處理常式。The object is passed as a parameter to the user-defined event handler. > [!NOTE] > 原點 （0，0） 是位於影像的左上角。The origin (0, 0) is located at the upper-left corner of the image. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件，以判斷以便使用者按一下的座標控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to determine the coordinates where the user clicks the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputImageServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageServerClick/CS/htmlinputimageserverclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputImageServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageServerClick/VB/htmlinputimageserverclickvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: The argument for the event.

summary.span: 回傳至伺服器時，便會引發 控制項的事件。

span.span: Raises events for the control when it posts back to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由控制項，它按一下時，引發事件。The method is used by the control, when it is clicked, to raise a event. 如果屬性是`true`;中指定的控制項群組的呼叫方法屬性。If the property is `true`; the method is called using the group of controls specified in the property. 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員擴充的功能使用控制項。This method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void RaisePostDataChangedEvent() cil managed

summary.span: 通知 控制項已變更控制項的狀態。

span.span: Notifies the control that the state of the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不會參與處理控制，並包含完成介面實作。The method does not participate in the processing of the control and is included to complete the interface implementation. 主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

summary.span: 將 控制項的屬性轉譯為指定的 物件。

span.span: Renders the control's attributes to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法解析設定的 URL屬性，將寫入`onclick`屬性呈現控制如果屬性是`true`，最後會呼叫基底和方法。The method resolves the URL set in the property, writes the `onclick` attribute of the rendered control if the property is `true`, and finally calls the base method. 如果值屬性是格式不正確的 URL，擲回例外狀況。If the value of the property is a malformed URL, an exception is thrown. 主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中自訂的伺服器控制項，以便特定替代文字，可存取的工具提示，一律會顯示與。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that specific alternate text, accessible as a ToolTip, is always displayed with the . [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputImageRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlinputimage_renderattributescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputImageRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlinputimage_renderattributesvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputImageRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlinputimage_renderattributes.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputImageRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputImageRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlinputimage_renderattributes.vb#2)]

exception.span: 屬性包含不正確的 URL。

span.span: The property contains a malformed URL.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ServerClick As ImageClickEventHandler

summary.span: 發生在伺服器上，當使用者按一下 控制項時。

span.span: Occurs on the server when the user clicks an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件，當使用者按一下控制項。The event is raised when the user clicks an control. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件，以判斷以便使用者按一下的座標控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to determine the coordinates where the user clicks the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.ServerClick Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputImageServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageServerClick/CS/htmlinputimageserverclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputImageServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageServerClick/VB/htmlinputimageserverclickvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Src { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定影像檔的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location of the image file.
The location of the image file.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要顯示在 映像的位置控制項。Use the property to specify the location of the image to display in the control. 如果找不到映像，在指定的文字顯示屬性。If the image is not available, the text specified in the property is displayed. 您可以使用相對或絕對的 URL。You can use a relative or absolute URL. 相對的 URL 相關的網頁位置之影像的位置不在伺服器上指定完整路徑。A relative URL relates the location of the image to the location of the Web page without specifying a complete path on the server. 路徑是相對於網頁上的位置。The path is relative to the location of the Web page. 這可讓您容易到另一個目錄移動整個站台伺服器上而不更新程式碼中的映像的路徑。This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the path to the image in code. 您可以使用相對路徑" `~/` "來參照目前頁面所在的虛擬目錄。You can use the relative path " `~/` " to refer to the current virtual directory where the page is located. 例如，值如``"XspTest 」 中的頁面上的虛擬目錄是``。For example, the value of for `` on a page in the "XspTest" virtual directory is ``. 絕對 URL 提供的完整路徑。An absolute URL provides the complete path. 因此，將站台移至另一個目錄，需要您更新程式碼。Therefore, moving the site to another directory requires that you update the code. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的路徑中所顯示之影像控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the path to an image displayed in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputImage.Src Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The argument for the event.

summary.span: 讓 控制項能夠在回傳時引發事件。

span.span: Enables the control to raise events on postback.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項群組， 控制項會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組進行驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 控制項群組， 控制項會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組進行驗證。

span.span: The group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定這個屬性。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), indicating that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證群組可讓您將驗證頁面上的控制項指派給特定的類別。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每個驗證群組可以在頁面上的其他驗證群組從獨立進行驗證。Each validation group can be validated independently from other validation groups on the page. 使用屬性，以指定的驗證群組名稱的控制項回傳至伺服器時，會驗證。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 此屬性沒有作用時，才值屬性設定為`true`。This property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 當您指定的值屬性，只是指定群組的成員驗證控制項的驗證時控制項回傳至伺服器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果您未指定此屬性的值和屬性設定為`true`，控制項回傳至伺服器時，會驗證所有驗證控制項在頁面上驗證群組未指派。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要驗證時的控制項控制項回傳至伺服器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the controls to validate when an control posts back to the server. 此頁面包含從使用者擷取資料的兩個文字方塊和兩個控制項，以確保該使用者不會讓文字方塊空白。The page contains two text boxes to capture data from the user and two controls to ensure that the user does not leave a text box blank. 控制項中的第一個文字方塊是`CityInfoGroup`驗證群組和控制項中的第二個方塊是`StateInfoGroup`驗證群組。The control for the first text box is in the `CityInfoGroup` validation group and the control for the second box is in the `StateInfoGroup` validation group. 當`CityQueryButton`按一下時，控制項在`CityInfoGroup`驗證群組驗證。When the `CityQueryButton` is clicked, only the control in the `CityInfoGroup` validation group is validated. 當`StateQueryButton`按一下時，控制項在`StateInfoGroup`驗證群組驗證。When the `StateQueryButton` is clicked, only the control in the `StateInfoGroup` validation group is validated. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputImageValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageValidationGroup/cs/htmlinputimagevalidationgroupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputImageValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputImageValidationGroup/vb/htmlinputimagevalidationgroupvb.aspx#1)]
